title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows for the separation of concerns, devising their code between the model layer for data, view layer for design and controller layer for the logic of the application.

title: Authentication Vs Authorisation
content: Authentication refers to authenticating your own identity, whilst authorisation deals with being authorising a user with access into the system.

title: Object Relational Mapping
content: Object-relational mapping (ORM) is a technique that creates a layer between the language and the database, helping programmers work with data without the OOP paradigm.
